trans-unit.source: Supports the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform data retrieval using Structured Query Language (SQL) against a Microsoft Access database.
trans-unit.target: Suporta o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref> controlar e fornece uma interface para controlos vinculados a dados efetuar a obtenção de dados através de linguagem SQL (Structured Query) em relação a uma base de dados do Microsoft Access.

trans-unit.source: The AccessDataSourceView class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls and not as a programmable object in page code.
trans-unit.target: A classe de AccessDataSourceView destina-se principalmente a ser utilizada por controlos vinculados a dados e não como um objeto programável no código da página.

trans-unit.source: The AccessDataSourceView class is provided because Microsoft Access is a file-based database system and has several unique characteristics that set it apart from other SQL-based relational database products that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> classes are used with.
trans-unit.target: A classe de AccessDataSourceView é fornecida porque Microsoft Access é um sistema de base de dados baseada em ficheiros e tem várias características exclusivas que defini-lo para além dos outros produtos de base de dados relacional baseada no SQL Server que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>controlo e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>as classes são utilizadas com.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView"></xref> class setting the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> control as the owner of the current view.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView"> </xref> especificada a definição de classe <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref> controlo como o proprietário da vista atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control to access the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SelectParameters%2A> collections when retrieving data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>objeto é utilizado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>controlo para aceder a parâmetros a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SelectParameters%2A>coleções ao obter dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SelectParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The data source control with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView"></xref> is associated.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de origem de dados com o qual o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView"> </xref> está associado.

trans-unit.source: A unique name for the data source view, within the scope of the data source control that owns it.
trans-unit.target: Um nome exclusivo para a vista de origem de dados, no âmbito do controlo de origem de dados é a proprietária.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data from the underlying data storage using the SQL string in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SelectCommand*> property and any parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SelectParameters*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém dados a partir do armazenamento de dados subjacente utilizando a cadeia de SQL no <> </> *> propriedade e quaisquer parâmetros de <> </> *> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> object overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> method to ensure that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A> property of its associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control is set before retrieving data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>substituições de objeto a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>método para se certificar de que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A>propriedade associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>controlo está definido antes de obter dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Before the ExecuteSelect method is performed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: Antes do método ExecuteSelect for executado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>método é denominado para aumentar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting> event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: Pode processar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting>eventos para examinar os valores dos parâmetros e efetuar qualquer pré-processamentos antes de uma operação de obtenção de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: To perform the data retrieval, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> object builds an <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> object using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> text and any associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para efetuar a obtenção de dados, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>objeto compilações um <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>objeto utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>texto e quaisquer associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> object executes the <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> object against the underlying data storage.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>objeto executa o <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>objeto contra o armazenamento de dados subjacente.</xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: After the operation completes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected> event.
trans-unit.target: Após a conclusão da operação, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>método é denominado para aumentar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected> event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing.
trans-unit.target: Pode processar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>eventos para examinar os valores de retorno e códigos de erro e efetuar qualquer processamento posterior ao.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> value and caching is enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>propriedade está definida como o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode>valor e a colocação em cache está ativada, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>obtém dados a partir do e guarda dados em cache durante a operação de obtenção de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed, based on the caching behavior that is specified by the combination of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A cache é criada, eliminada, ou atualizada, com base no comportamento de colocação em cache que é especificado pela combinação da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> value and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> property has been specified, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is evaluated along with any supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> properties and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>propriedade está definida como o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode>valor e um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A>propriedade foi especificada o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>propriedade é avaliada juntamente com qualquer fornecido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A>Propriedades e o filtro resultante é aplicada à lista de dados durante a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>operação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> that is used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> que é utilizado para pedir operações nos dados para além de obtenção de dados básica.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> of data rows.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>de linhas de dados.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ou uma cadeia vazia ("").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile*>

trans-unit.source: The arguments passed to the ExecuteSelect method specify that the data source should perform some additional work while retrieving data to enable paging or sorting through the retrieved data, but the data source control does not support the requested capability.
trans-unit.target: O arguments transmitido para o ExecuteSelect método especificar que a origem de dados deve efetuar algumas tarefas adicionais ao obter dados para ativar a paginação ou ordenação através dos dados obtidos, mas o controlo de origem de dados não suporta a capacidade de pedido.
